Articles.Content: I want to turn off cutting throttle when switching away from crafts, and to be able to change vessels while moving over the surface. Neither Lazor Systems or burn together work/do this, so please don't suggest is there a modification I can make to the install for this personally?
Do you mean within the physics bubble? By default vessels keep their throttle settings when switching between them in the bubble.

> 
> Do you mean within the physics bubble? By default vessels keep their throttle settings when switching between them in the bubble.

Not jet engines.

Jets do too.

I was doing the comparison between two intake models. Launch two minimal jet engine - tank - fins - intake setups from the launchpad at the same moment. I could switch between the two just fine as long as they stayed in range of each other, and neither lost thrust while I switched to the other.

OTOH if you switch out of the current physics bubble (to a craft more than 2.2km away), you're not just losing throttle settings, you're risking the craft vanishing altogether.

Switching to a vessel more than 200m away with no jet engines but within the physics bubble will cause the first jet to throttle down.

[edit: Even if it didn't I'm still struggling with the problem of even switching vessels while moving and more than 200m away. can I change this radius?]
